cards.text: Ancient runes glow on the entrance wall. A whisper echoes: 'Only the worthy may pass through these halls.'
You discover a dusty scroll on the floor. It describes a legendary artifact hidden deep within the labyrinth, sought by heroes for centuries.
Strange symbols align on the ancient stones before you. They seem to form a riddle, testing your wisdom and wit.
Two paths diverge ahead. One bears the mark of the ancients, glowing with golden light. The other whispers of forgotten shadows and untold secrets.
A glimmering light reveals the final chamber ahead. The artifact awaits, and your heroic quest nears its triumphant end.
Dark energy pulses through the walls. The air is thick with malice. Someone has been here before you, leaving a trail of corruption.
Claw marks scar the ancient stones. You sense a trap has been laid for the unwary. Darkness watches from every shadow.
A sinister presence lingers here. The puzzle before you reeks of deception, designed to ensnare those who seek power.
The path splits ominously. One way promises forbidden power and dominion. The other offers a chance at redemption, though the price may be steep.
The final chamber looms, shrouded in shadow. Will you confront the darkness that dwells within, or become one with it?
